> Absolutely agreed. As I wrote earlier in this thread, comments that say 
> "I had to do this silly thing, because..." actually *communicate*, 
> whereas 90% of comments I see communicate nothing that the code cannot 
> itself more effectively communicate.

Always keep in mind: "Document what you mean, not what you do"

-Vladimir
